name: Tear of Alicia
description:
When Milo the Crystal Mapper came back to this country, the war between Twilight Academy and King's Feather has been ended. As the last sorcerer, he was put into jail.

But the king and his feathers have no ideas what Milo's planning, and vice versa.

One day when the moon is sunk into the darkness, Royal Knight Lawrence would like to spare Milo for unknown reasons, so he secretly delivered a worn bracelet to the latter...
